data.title: WELCOME
data.text:
I love stories.

I love music.

I love being a musical storyteller.

Since 2005 I have directed over 70 operas and musicals worldwide, everything from famous pieces for major international opera companies and commercial theatre managements to obscure curiosities for

renowned colleges, conservatoires and academies.

And everything in between.

Whatever the scale, wherever music and drama meet, thatâ€™s where you will find me passionately engaged in my craft.

I'm also passionate about theatre architecture.

I was born and raised in Melbourne so I'm an Aussie. I live in London.

I'm not married to Joanna Lumley.

If you have a story to tell with music give me a shout.
